alert.note: Alert for Mohave (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 22 at 3:12PM MST until July 22 at 4:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...East central Mohave County in northwestern Arizona near Peach Springs. * WHEN...Until 600 PM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 309 PM MST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Radar estimates that up to 1 inch of rain has fallen over the warned area with additional rainfall expected. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Diamond Creek Campground, Diamond Creek Road, Peach Springs Wash, Box Canyon, Mesquite Springs Campground, and Peach Springs. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
